name: Warhammer Killer
mail_content: Please participate actively in the rallies against the Warhammer. Activate "Auto-join" in the Battle menu.
task_info: Warhammer-4K is a robot made by the Dark Legion
rank_info: it has rich rewards. You need to rally with your Alliance members to attack it.
column21: Gain 1 point each time you join/rally an Attack Party against Warhammer

name: Fearless Master
guide_info: You can earn points by attacking and killing enemies. The higher the level of the defeated units
unlock_level: the higher the points you can gain.
mail_content: Fearless Master
task_info: Observe before you attack the enemies. If there are too many units
rank_info: consider rally attack parties.
column21: Attack is the best defense and also the best way to show your strength.
column22: Gained by attacking and killing enemies

name: The Great Leader
guide_info: Complete this task by winning in the Capital ConTest
mail_content: Conquer the Capital and prevent other Alliances from taking over the Silo to attack the Capital.
task_info: Winning the Capital ConTest is just a warm-up for the Cross-warzone War.

name: Cross-warzone Champ
desc: Alliance conquer the opponent Capital and win the war:
guide_info: Complete this task by winning in the Capital ConTest and conquering the opponent's Capital
mail_content: Take over ruins as fast as possible to be closer to the Capital.
task_info: Taking over the final Capital in the Cross-warzone War demonstrates your ability to all commanders.
